title: 383D.76 COUNTY MANAGER PLAN.
text:
Provided that it meets the requirements of section 375A.01, subdivision 2, the county board of Dakota County may adopt by resolution the county manager plan described in section 375A.03, subdivisions 1, 2, 3, and 4, paragraph (a), and 375A.04, subdivision 1. Section 375A.12 does not apply to the adoption of the county manager plan under this subdivision.
If Dakota County adopts the county manager plan as provided in subdivision 1, all references to the county administrator in chapter 383D shall be deemed to refer to the county manager, section 383D.153 shall be preempted, and sections 383D.09 and 383D.21 to 383D.35 shall not be preempted.
